title: HDFC Bank Q4 Results Preview: Check Date, Time, Analysts' Expectations
summary: A preview announcement for HDFC Bank's fourth quarter results for 2025, including scheduling details and market expectations.
content:
HDFC Bank is set to announce its fourth quarter results for the fiscal year 2025. The announcement comes as market analysts and investors eagerly await the financial performance of India's largest private sector bank following its historic merger.

The results will be released according to the Indian Standard Time schedule, with key metrics and performance indicators to be discussed during the announcement.

source.title: HDFC Bank Q4 results preview: Check date, time, analysts' expectations
